Once we allow companies to become this powerful, the FCC does not regulate them, says Vermont Al Franken Sen. Bernie Sanders . "They regulate the FCC," says the senator. No reasonable regulator would debate Sen. Bernie Sanders 's point-or the threat to democracy posed when traditional protections against media monopoly are abandoned.

Messrs. Eric Schmidt , Page and Sergey Brin sought to play down any personality differences on Thursday. In an interview, Mr. Eric Schmidt said there had been no friction between the three that led to the change, and that they have been running particularly well in the last six or nine months because of this shared goal in efficiency.
